diwali.text: May the festival of lights brighten your life with endless joy and happiness.
diwali.author: Traditional

diwali.text: Let us celebrate the festival of lights by dispelling the darkness from our hearts and minds.
diwali.author: Unknown

diwali.text: May the divine light of Diwali spread into your life peace, prosperity, happiness and good health.
diwali.author: Traditional

diwali.text: Diwali is a time to reflect on our lives and make changes for a brighter future.
diwali.author: Unknown

diwali.text: As the light of the lamp dispels darkness, may the light within us dispel all darkness in our lives.
diwali.author: Hindu Proverb

diwali.text: May millions of lamps illuminate your life with endless joy, prosperity, health and wealth forever.
diwali.author: Traditional

diwali.text: Let us keep our hearts and homes illuminated with love, light and joy.
diwali.author: Unknown

diwali.text: The light of Diwali reminds us that light will always overcome darkness.
diwali.author: Traditional

diwali.text: May your life be as colorful and beautiful as the rangolis of Diwali.
diwali.author: Unknown

diwali.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that.
diwali.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

christmas.text: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind.
christmas.author: Calvin Coolidge

christmas.text: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
christmas.author: Burton Hillis

christmas.text: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
christmas.author: Norman Vincent Peale

christmas.text: May the Christmas season fill your home with joy, your heart with love and your life with laughter.
christmas.author: Traditional

christmas.text: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
christmas.author: Charles M. Schulz

christmas.text: The joy of Christmas is a joy that knows no boundaries.
christmas.author: Traditional

christmas.text: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
christmas.author: Alexander Smith

christmas.text: What is Christmas? It is tenderness for the past, courage for the present, and hope for the future.
christmas.author: Agnes M. Pahro

christmas.text: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
christmas.author: Winston Churchill

christmas.text: The magic of Christmas is not in the presents but in His presence.
christmas.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: Eid is a day of joy, thanksgiving, worship, brotherhood, and unity.
eid-al-fitr.author: Islamic Tradition

eid-al-fitr.text: May Allah flood your life with happiness, your heart with love, and your soul with spirituality.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: The month of Ramadan is like rain that turns the earth green.
eid-al-fitr.author: Islamic Proverb

eid-al-fitr.text: Eid is not just a celebration but a time to reflect on Allah's blessings.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: May this Eid bring happiness, joy and blessings to you and your family.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: When the month of Ramadan arrives, the gates of paradise are opened.
eid-al-fitr.author: Prophet Muhammad

eid-al-fitr.text: May Allah accept your good deeds, forgive your transgressions, and ease your affairs.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: Eid is a time when we thank Allah for giving us the strength to complete Ramadan.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

eid-al-fitr.text: Let us celebrate this day of Eid with prayers, love, and gratitude.
eid-al-fitr.author: Traditional

holi.text: Let the colors of Holi spread the message of peace and happiness.
holi.author: Traditional

holi.text: Life is full of colors, let's celebrate every shade this Holi.
holi.author: Unknown

holi.text: May your life be as colorful and beautiful as the colors of Holi.
holi.author: Traditional

holi.text: Holi reminds us that life is a celebration, color it with love.
holi.author: Unknown

holi.text: Let the colors of Holi wash away the animosity and fill your heart with love.
holi.author: Traditional

holi.text: Add colors to your life by splashing them on others.
holi.author: Holi Proverb

holi.text: May the festival of colors bring joy and happiness in your life.
holi.author: Traditional

holi.text: Holi is the time to develop the strength of unity and celebrate together.
holi.author: Unknown

holi.text: Let the colors of Holi paint your life with joy and prosperity.
holi.author: Traditional

holi.text: Play safe, spread love, and have a colorful Holi.
holi.author: Traditional

chinese-new-year.text: May the new year bring you prosperity, health, and happiness.
chinese-new-year.author: Chinese Blessing

chinese-new-year.text: A year of good fortune and happiness awaits you.
chinese-new-year.author: Traditional

chinese-new-year.text: Gong Xi Fa Cai! May you have a prosperous new year.
chinese-new-year.author: Traditional Greeting

chinese-new-year.text: New year, new beginnings, new opportunities, new blessings.
chinese-new-year.author: Chinese Saying

chinese-new-year.text: May this new year be filled with good health, prosperity, and happiness.
chinese-new-year.author: Traditional

chinese-new-year.text: Let go of the old and welcome the new with open arms.
chinese-new-year.author: Chinese Proverb

chinese-new-year.text: May the new year bring peace, love, and joy to your family.
chinese-new-year.author: Traditional

chinese-new-year.text: With the new year comes new opportunities and new dreams.
chinese-new-year.author: Chinese Saying

chinese-new-year.text: May your new year be as bright as the lanterns that light up the sky.
chinese-new-year.author: Traditional

thanksgiving.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
thanksgiving.author: Anonymous

thanksgiving.text: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
thanksgiving.author: Oprah Winfrey

thanksgiving.text: Thanksgiving is a time of togetherness and gratitude.
thanksgiving.author: Traditional

thanksgiving.text: Give thanks not just on Thanksgiving Day, but every day of your life.
thanksgiving.author: Unknown

thanksgiving.text: The more you practice gratitude, the more you find to be grateful for.
thanksgiving.author: Unknown

thanksgiving.text: Thanksgiving is the holiday that encompasses all others.
thanksgiving.author: Traditional

thanksgiving.text: When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out.
thanksgiving.author: Kristin Armstrong

thanksgiving.text: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy.
thanksgiving.author: Marcel Proust

thanksgiving.text: Gratitude is the inward feeling of kindness received.
thanksgiving.author: Henry Van Dyke

easter.text: Easter is the demonstration of God that life is essentially spiritual and timeless.
easter.author: Charles M. Crowe

easter.text: The resurrection gives my life meaning and direction.
easter.author: Robert Flatt

easter.text: Easter says you can put truth in a grave, but it won't stay there.
easter.author: Clarence W. Hall

easter.text: May the miracle of Easter bring you renewed hope, faith, and joy.
easter.author: Traditional

easter.text: Easter is meant to be a symbol of hope, renewal, and new life.
easter.author: Janine di Giovanni

easter.text: May the promise of Easter fill your heart with peace and joy.
easter.author: Traditional

easter.text: Easter spells out beauty, the rare beauty of new life.
easter.author: S.D. Gordon

easter.text: The great gift of Easter is hope.
easter.author: Basil C. Hume

easter.text: Easter is the soul's first taste of spring.
easter.author: Traditional

navratri.text: May Goddess Durga destroy all your sorrows and bring you strength.
navratri.author: Traditional

navratri.text: Let the divine energy of Navratri fill your life with power and prosperity.
navratri.author: Hindu Blessing

navratri.text: May Maa Durga bless you with happiness, health, and prosperity.
navratri.author: Traditional

navratri.text: Navratri is not just a festival, it's a celebration of the feminine divine.
navratri.author: Unknown

navratri.text: May the nine nights of Navratri bring nine times more happiness to you.
navratri.author: Traditional

navratri.text: Let the garba of life keep spinning with joy and devotion.
navratri.author: Unknown

navratri.text: May Goddess Durga remove all obstacles from your path.
navratri.author: Hindu Blessing

navratri.text: This Navratri, may you find the goddess within yourself.
navratri.author: Traditional

navratri.text: Victory to Maa Durga, the destroyer of evil and protector of good.
navratri.author: Traditional

navratri.text: May the blessings of Shakti empower you to achieve all your dreams.
navratri.author: Hindu Blessing

hanukkah.text: May the lights of Hanukkah bring you warmth, comfort, and joy.
hanukkah.author: Traditional

hanukkah.text: A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle.
hanukkah.author: Jewish Proverb

hanukkah.text: Hanukkah teaches us that even a little light can dispel great darkness.
hanukkah.author: Unknown

hanukkah.text: May the Festival of Lights brighten your home and heart.
hanukkah.author: Traditional

hanukkah.text: Eight nights of light, eight reasons to celebrate.
hanukkah.author: Unknown

hanukkah.text: Let the menorah's glow illuminate your path with hope and faith.
hanukkah.author: Traditional

hanukkah.text: Hanukkah is a celebration of miracles, faith, and perseverance.
hanukkah.author: Unknown

hanukkah.text: May the spirit of Hanukkah fill your home with happiness.
hanukkah.author: Traditional

hanukkah.text: From generation to generation, we kindle the lights of freedom.
hanukkah.author: Jewish Tradition

hanukkah.text: May your Hanukkah be as bright as the candles in your menorah.
hanukkah.author: Traditional

new-year.text: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
new-year.author: Oprah Winfrey

new-year.text: New year, new feels, new chances, same dreams, fresh starts.
new-year.author: Unknown

new-year.text: May the new year bring you happiness, peace, and prosperity.
new-year.author: Traditional

new-year.text: Every new year is another chance to change your life.
new-year.author: Unknown

new-year.text: The new year stands before us like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written.
new-year.author: Melody Beattie

new-year.text: May all your dreams and wishes come true in the coming year.
new-year.author: Traditional

new-year.text: A new year, a new chapter, a new start.
new-year.author: Unknown

new-year.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
new-year.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

new-year.text: Let the new year bring positive changes and beautiful moments.
new-year.author: Traditional

new-year.text: May this year be the one where all your dreams come true.
new-year.author: Traditional

raksha-bandhan.text: The bond between siblings is unbreakable, eternal, and full of love.
raksha-bandhan.author: Traditional

raksha-bandhan.text: A brother is a friend given by nature.
raksha-bandhan.author: Jean Baptiste Legouve

raksha-bandhan.text: Sisters are different flowers from the same garden.
raksha-bandhan.author: Unknown

raksha-bandhan.text: May the thread of rakhi strengthen the bond of love between siblings.
raksha-bandhan.author: Traditional

raksha-bandhan.text: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters.
raksha-bandhan.author: Clara Ortega

raksha-bandhan.text: This Raksha Bandhan, may our bond grow stronger with each passing year.
raksha-bandhan.author: Traditional

raksha-bandhan.text: A sibling is a lens through which you see your childhood.
raksha-bandhan.author: Ann Hood

raksha-bandhan.text: The greatest gift our parents ever gave us was each other.
raksha-bandhan.author: Unknown

raksha-bandhan.text: May the sacred thread of rakhi bring endless joy to our family.
raksha-bandhan.author: Traditional

valentines-day.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
valentines-day.author: Aristotle

valentines-day.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
valentines-day.author: Audrey Hepburn

valentines-day.text: Where there is love there is life.
valentines-day.author: Mahatma Gandhi

valentines-day.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
valentines-day.author: David Viscott

valentines-day.text: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
valentines-day.author: Leo Christopher

valentines-day.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
valentines-day.author: Loretta Young

valentines-day.text: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.
valentines-day.author: Maya Angelou

valentines-day.text: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
valentines-day.author: Roy Croft

valentines-day.text: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
valentines-day.author: Eden Ahbez
